azhars.name: Landing Page - Azhars Cleaning
azhars.description: Landing page for a professional cleaning company, delivering spotless results for homes and businesses through expert services, eco-friendly products, and personalized care.

consteladora.name: Landing Page - Family Constellations
consteladora.description: Landing page for a Family Constellations company, offering guidance and healing through transformative workshops and personalized support.

gascertcol.name: Landing Page - Gascertcol
gascertcol.description: Landing page for a Gas Network Inspection company, highlighting expert services, safety, and reliability with clear calls-to-action and client-focused content.

articlesGPT.name: Articles Generator GPT-4
articlesGPT.description: Application developed with React that connects to the GPT-4 API to generate article summaries. Users can input text or URLs and get concise and coherent summaries.

dashboard.name: Interactive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Application developed with React and styled with Sass, offering a sophisticated and interactive user experience with real-time data visualization through dynamic and intuitive charts.

realTimeChat.name: Real Time Chat App
realTimeChat.description: Real-time chat application built with React and Firebase. Allows Google sign-in and instant messaging updated in real time thanks to Firebase Firestore.

travelLanding.name: Travel Landing Page
travelLanding.description: Attractive landing page for camping in Pereira, built with Next.js and TailwindCSS. Showcases stunning views and rich biodiversity with fast navigation and responsive design.

servicesSubtitle: End-to-end digital experiences, production-ready with accessibility-first thinking.
workExperienceSubtitle: Experience building end-to-end products inside multidisciplinary teams.
technologiesSubtitle: A stack ready to ship fast, accessible and maintainable products.
projectsSubtitle: Selection of recent builds focused on performance, clear storytelling, and thoughtful micro-interactions.

services.title: Web development
services.description: I'm a web developer specialized in crafting engaging and functional online experiences. Using technologies like React.js, Node.js, and Laravel, I build high-performance web systems that are user-friendly and efficient.

services.title: UI/UX Designing
services.description: As a UX/UI designer, I specialize in crafting intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences. My focus is on enhancing user satisfaction through thoughtful design that seamlessly integrates functionality with aesthetics.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: I specialize in developing complex software solutions using various technologies like React.js, Node.js, Laravel, and more. My focus is on creating robust and scalable applications that drive innovation.

about.description: Junior Full Stack Developer with a talent for problem-solving and a creative mindset. Dedicated to delivering innovative web solutions.

workExp.title: Fullstack developer - Software factory - CDITI Dosquebradas
resp: I developed a comprehensive system with Laravel to centralize and efficiently manage information from multiple databases of a non-profit foundation.
I implemented collaboration and version control with Git and GitLab for efficient code management.
I optimized the performance of the database with MySQL to ensure reliable storage and retrieval of data.
I designed a secure and scalable architecture with Laravel to enhance the organization, accessibility, and security of data, facilitating decision-making and goal achievement in social work.

workExp.title: Fullstack Developer - Suzuki Motor of Colombia
resp: Active participation in full stack development at Suzuki, using React and Node to design and implement web solutions and systems from scratch.
Comprehensive contribution from design to implementation, ensuring coherence and efficiency throughout the development process.
Effective collaboration using Git and GitLab to manage versions and facilitate teamwork.
Significant professional growth and contribution to the company's success, thanks to acquired experience and solutions implemented with React, Node, Git, GitLab, and PostgreSQL.
